body.name: 6-Tier Blanket Ladder Wooden, 5.7FT(66.5'') Blanket Quilt Towel Holder Rack Decorative Ladder, Easy Assembly, Rustic Farmhouse Ladder Shelf for The Living Room Bedroom Bathroom Home Decor, Brown

features: SPACE-SAVING: 66.5" H x 18" W. Leaning freestanding design make the wooden blanket ladders take up minimal space while providing a convenient way to hang and display throw blankets, towel rack, and quilts. The blanket ladders can be the perfect choosing creating storage for your living room, bedroom or bathroom.

AESTHETIC AND PRACTICAL: The blanket holder have a modern farmhouse decor style design that can serve as a decorative item while also being practical. Their rustic look usually blends seamlessly into different home decor styles.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: The ladder shelves for living room are pre assembled furniture. Installation instructions are included in the ladder shelf frame package, even people without any home decor improvement experience can easily install it. It doesn't take ten minutes to install, and you'll get a perfect piece of bedroom bathroom decor.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: The ladder racks is not only a hanger for display blanket , but also can be used to hang towels, throws, quilts, scarves, ties, clothes, belts and other items, it is a multi-functional piece of bedroom furniture. You can also use them to display your collections or plants as a great piece of fireplace, farmhouse, living room, bedroom or bathroom wall decor. The step ladder can be placed in any room to add a touch of warmth and style.

PERSONALIZE: The quilt blanket ladder shelf comes with 6-layer ladder boards, you can choose the number of rungs or the height of the ladder to suit your space and what you want to hang. You can create personal and unique pieces that fit your space and style.

PREMIUM QUALITY: The blanket ladder is made of wear-resistant high-quality solid wood, which is strong and firm. The wood is smooth to prevent snagging your blankets and clothing. We added pads at the bottom and top of the ladder, don't worry about scratching your floor and wall. We optimize and reinforce the ladder structure, and each ladder is equipped with reinforced iron sheets, which can bear the weight of blankets and quilts without bending or deforming.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: The decorative ladder for blankets makes an ideal gift for special occasions such as weddings or housewarming parties, or as a thoughtful gift to yourself. It is also a great way to express your personal style and taste. Wooden blanket ladders require little maintenance, requiring only a simple wipe to keep them clean and dust-free.

DO NOT CLIMBING: The Blanket ladder wood is only used for hanging blanket, towel, quilt, clothes or decorative accessories, as farmhouse bedroom bathroom house decor. It can't bear big weight, please don't climb the decorative ladder.
PACKAGE LIST:The blanket ladders for the living room package includes ladder legs*2, ladder boards*6, long screws*25, short screws*14, iron sheets*6, screwdriver*1.

WORRY-FREE AFTER SALES: Delywh is committed to providing customers with high-quality products and after-sales service. No matter you have any problems with our products, please feel free to contact us, we will send you a new replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and put together. Seems sturdy but did have one splintered area. Other than that, this is nice and has grips on the feet so it doesn’t slide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ladder came in a surprisingly small box, but unfolded for assembly. It was pretty neat, except one of the preassembled pieces was affixed backwards and we had to take that portion apart and reassemble it again. Overall, it is a good value for the money and I am pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: It brought so much to an empty space. Looks cute and is functional. It was also very easy to assemble! I love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better Blanket Ladders Out There
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what I was expecting with this. It comes in a small box and you have to built the ladder. It doesn't seem super sturdy. We had been looking for a blanket ladder at multiple places. My wife wanted this white one though. For a little more you can get a blanket ladder assembled and study from your local stores. The ones we look at looked better and of better quality. This one gets the job done, but I wish we would have spent a little more and got a preassembled ladder from our local stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two because I have quilts I wanted to display. They were fairly easy to assemble. The wood should be sanded better before finished. I had two splinters to get out of my fingers. Did not like that at all!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not the sturdiest thing ever. Holes didn’t align for screws and wood cracked easily. It’s lopsided One side stands away from the wall by at least an inch and a half. It’s “wobbly”. And I got two…. What was I thinking? Hard pass on this one y’all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece to my living room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The box it came in was surprisingly small, but the leg pieces fold out. I don't necessarily like the look of the brackets you can see of the side from assembly, but it holds up to blankets and even on my wood floor, it doesn't slide. Overall, not too shabby.
It is as seen in pictures, easy to assemble and looks nice
Happy with this purchase. Small blankets will look very nice on this ladder, leaning against a wall.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not very sturdy, can only hold a couple blankets at time
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It buckles and falls over if you add more then a couple blankets, the screws keep popping out and it doesn't lay flush to the wall. The look of it is about the only thing I like about it.
